授業目的: The purpose of this class is to refine advanced English communication skills (discussion, debate, comprehension, critical thinking) through the study of authentic English materials (articles, texts, videos, lectures). Students will also further improve their research, writing, and presentation skills.
到達目標:
Students will be able to: give a 10 to 20-minute informative presentation based on research of a topic related to global communication, analyze communication between speakers of various cultural and linguistic backgrounds, demonstrate appropriate strategies for participating in and facilitating a discussion or debate, write a research paper (1000-1200 words) that summarizes and evaluates research on a topic related to global communication
-Read authentic texts on topics related to global communication, identifying author bias, logical fallacies, and other barriers to understanding
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Classes are conducted face-to-face in the classroom.
The online class participants will receive online simultaneous interactive delivery during class time.

トピック.授業計画1: Students will be provided with a detailed syllabus during the first lesson. In principle, weekly classes will be held in both computer labs and regular classrooms. Computer lab lessons will be dedicated to lectures, research, writing, and discussion of the final essay. Classroom lessons will be used for textbook activities as well as student-led discussions of articles, videos, presentations, and debates.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are expected to prepare homework assignments from the textbook, research and summarize English articles for discussion and debate, and write a 1,000-1,200 word research essay.
